select ic.comment_level commentLevel, ic.content, ic.sepc_name specName, ic.created_time createdTime, u.face userFace, u.nickname from items_comments ic left join users u on ic.user_id = u.id where ic.item_id = #{paramsMap.itemId}
and ic.comment_level = #{paramsMap.level}

select i.id itemId, i.item_name itemName, i.sell_counts sellCounts, ii.url imgUrl, tempSpec.priceDiscount price from items i left join items_img ii on i.id = ii.item_id left join (select item_id, min(price_discount) priceDiscount from items_spec group by item_id) tempSpec on i.id = tempSpec.item_id where ii.is_main = 1
and i.item_name like '%${paramsMap.keywords}%'
order by
i.sell_counts desc
tempSpec.priceDiscount asc
i.item_name asc
